message.content:
I need to identify the line item and value representing the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life - in other words, the depreciation expense.

Looking through the financial statements:

1. In the balance sheet, I see the "Accumulated Depreciation" line with an end amount of 45748.43.

2. In the cash flow statement, I see "Depreciation" listed as 45748.43.

3. In the income statement, I also see "Depreciation" listed as 45748.43.

The depreciation expense represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of assets over their useful lives. This is clearly shown in the income statement and cash flow statement with the value of 45748.43.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '45748.43'} }
```
